00074 void FFNetReplace(const string &str, string &newString, const string &token, const string &newToken1, int newToken2, const string &newToken3) {
00075   char buffer[256];
00076 
00077   sprintf(buffer, "%d", newToken2);
00078   string newToken = newToken1 + buffer + newToken3;
00079 
00080   string::size_type pos;
00081   newString = str;
00082   
00083   pos = newString.find (token, 0);
00084   while(pos != string::npos) {
00085     newString.replace(pos, token.length(), newToken);
00086     pos = newString.find (token, 0);
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void FFNetSource(ostream &os, unsigned inputDimension, unsigned outputDimension,
00091            Array<int> &connectionMatrix, Array<double> &weightMatrix,
00092            char *g, char *gOut, unsigned p = 4) {
00093   unsigned i, j;
00094   bool first;
00095   string str;
00096 
00097   unsigned numberOfNeurons = weightMatrix.dim(0);
00098   unsigned firstOutputNeuron = numberOfNeurons - outputDimension;
00099   unsigned bias = numberOfNeurons;
00100 
00101   os.precision(p);
00102 
00103   os << "void model(double *in, double *out) {\n";
00104   for(j = 0; j < inputDimension; j++) 
00105     os << "  double z" << j << " = in[" << j << "];\n";
00106   
00107   for(i = inputDimension; i < firstOutputNeuron; i++) {
00108     first = true;
00109     for(j = 0; j < i; j++) 
00110       if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) {
00111         if(first) {
00112           os << "  double z" << i <<  " = z" << j << " * " << weightMatrix(i, j);
00113           first = false;
00114         } else {
00115           os << " + z" << j << " * " << weightMatrix(i, j);
00116         }
00117       }
00118     
00119     if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) 
00120       if(first) {
00121         os  << "double z" << i << " = " << weightMatrix(i, bias); // bias
00122         first = false;
00123       } else {
00124         os << " + " << weightMatrix(i, bias);
00125       }
00126 
00127     if(!first) {
00128       os << ";\n";
00129       FFNetReplace(g,str,"#","z",i,"");
00130       os << "  z" << i << " = " << str << ";\n";
00131     }
00132   }
00133   for(i = firstOutputNeuron; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00134     first = true;
00135 
00136     for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
00137       if(connectionMatrix(i, j)) {
00138         if(first) {
00139           os << "  out[" << i-firstOutputNeuron << "] = " << "z" << j
00140              << " * " << weightMatrix(i, j);
00141           first = false;
00142         } else {
00143           os << " + z" << j << " * " << weightMatrix(i, j);
00144         }
00145       }
00146     if(connectionMatrix(i, bias)) 
00147       if(first) {
00148         os << "  out[" << i-firstOutputNeuron << "] = " 
00149            << weightMatrix(i, bias); // bias
00150         first = false;
00151       } else {
00152         os << " + " << weightMatrix(i, bias); // bias
00153       }
00154     if(!first) {
00155       os << ";\n";
00156       FFNetReplace(gOut,str,"#","out[",i-firstOutputNeuron,"]");
00157       os <<  "  out[" << i-firstOutputNeuron << "] = " << str << ";\n";
00158     }
00159   }
00160   os << "};" << endl;
00161 }
